p: The decrease in the levels of HK2, PFK, PKM2, and LDHA in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS was further confirmed by RT-PCR (Figures 4(e)â€“ 4(h)). As expected, EECP treatment dramatically decreased the mRNA levels of HK2, PFK, PKM2, and LDHA in a dose-dependent manner compared with the LPS group.
